step.tex: I=\int\sqrt{1-4x^2}\, dx =\int 2\sqrt{\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)^2-x^2}\, dx \\ \text{which is of the form }\int M\sqrt{a^2-x^2}\, dx \\
